item.description:
Howdy! If you are looking for a different way to spend your Saturday evening come on out to the Midnight Rodeo Bar. So.....you've never had the chance to line dance? Come take Michelle's fun, easy lessons at 7:30.   COUNTRY MILE will be the band this Saturday.  If you are looking to meet new people this is the place! Come join us! There is a meetup table located near the bar or feel free to sit with your friends. See ya there for a boot scoot'in good time!

Howdy and welcome to new member Kelly Latter Cerulli! 


This Saturday the 23 will be the last time to sign up- Don't forget to sign up for our 2 year anniversary workshop/barbeque/vip admission package. ($25) Limited spots will be sold. The Jonathan Scott Band will be performing.  Don't miss it!



Also Hoofin it for Upreach (formerly the Longest Line Dance) tickets will be available ($10) !!

Grand Opening of Club Intrigue on July 29!  see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup sign on a table near the bar
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
